sentences.sCn: 而女队则选择推销梯子/手推车。

sentences.sContent: He was pushing a handtruck with difficulty.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was pushing a handtruck with difficulty.

sentences.sContent: He crashed the handtruck through the doors.
sentences.sContent_eng: He crashed the handtruck through the doors.
sentences.sCn: 他推着手推车乒乒乓乓地过了几道门。
